about.description:
diffoscope will try to get to the bottom of what makes files or directories
different. It will recursively unpack archives of many kinds and transform
various binary formats into more human readable form to compare them. It can
compare two tarballs, ISO images, or PDF just as easily.
about.summary: in-depth comparison of files, archives, and directories

commands:
pytest -vv \
  --tb=long \
  --cov=diffoscope \
  --cov-report=term-missing \
  --cov-report=term:skip-covered \
  --cov-fail-under=76 \
  --no-cov-on-fail \
  -k="not ( \
    assert_non_existing or \
    test_berkeley_db or \
    test_code_is_black_clean or \
    test_elf or \
    test_icc or \
    test_macho or \
    test_rlib or \
    test_wasm \
  )"

about.description:
diffoscope will try to get to the bottom of what makes files or directories
different. It will recursively unpack archives of many kinds and transform
various binary formats into more human readable form to compare them. It can
compare two tarballs, ISO images, or PDF just as easily.

commands:

  --tb=long \
  --cov=diffoscope \

    test_rlib or \
    test_wasm \
  )"

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "diffoscope" %}
{% set version = "166" %}
{% set build_number = "0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 20d0b4091ae535dc7d094bf5f366e0687e0b4337a268254b11925b8e7c9ea9c4

build:
  number: {{ build_number }}
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.7
  run:
    - python >=3.7
    - python-libarchive-c
    - python-magic

test:
  commands:
    - echo "tests in subpackages"

outputs:
  - name: {{ name }}
    build:
      script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv
      noarch: python
      number: {{ build_number }}
      entry_points:
        - diffoscope = diffoscope.main:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python >=3.7
      run:
        - python >=3.7
        - python-libarchive-c
        - python-magic
    test:
      imports:
        - diffoscope
      requires:
        - pip
      commands:
        - python -m pip check
        - diffoscope --version | grep {{ version }}
        - diffoscope --help
        - diffoscope --list-tools
        - diffoscope --list-missing-tools

  - name: {{ name }}-all-tools
    build:
      number: {{ build_number }}
      noarch: python
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python >=3.7
      run:
        - {{ pin_compatible(name) }}
        - argcomplete
        - binutils
        - bzip2
        - cctools
        - defusedxml
        - ffmpeg
        - gettext
        - ghc
        - giflib
        - h5py
        - hdf5
        - imagemagick
        - jsondiff
        - libdb
        - llvmdev
        - mono
        - ocaml
        - openjdk
        - openssh
        - pdfminer
        - poppler
        - postgresql
        - progressbar
        - pycryptodome
        - pypdf2
        - python-debian
        - python-tlsh
        - r
        - rpm-tools
        - unzip
        - vim
        - wabt
    test:
      source_files:
        - tests
      requires:
        # pip check
        - pip
        # real test deps
        - file
        - pytest
        # test extras
        - pytest-cov
      commands:
        - python -m pip check
        - diffoscope --list-missing-tools
        - |-
          pytest -vv \
            --tb=long \
            --cov=diffoscope \
            --cov-report=term-missing \
            --cov-report=term:skip-covered \
            --cov-fail-under=76 \
            --no-cov-on-fail \
            -k="not ( \
              assert_non_existing or \
              test_berkeley_db or \
              test_code_is_black_clean or \
              test_elf or \
              test_icc or \
              test_macho or \
              test_rlib or \
              test_wasm \
            )"

about:
  home: https://diffoscope.org
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: in-depth comparison of files, archives, and directories
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  dev_url: https://anonscm.debian.org/cgit/reproducible/diffoscope.git
  description: |-
    diffoscope will try to get to the bottom of what makes files or directories
    different. It will recursively unpack archives of many kinds and transform
    various binary formats into more human readable form to compare them. It can
    compare two tarballs, ISO images, or PDF just as easily.
  dev_url: https://salsa.debian.org/reproducible-builds/diffoscope

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
